title: Welcome to the <%= dateFormat.string %> edition
of the Justia client newsletter!
message: Welcome to the First Edition of the Justia Insider!

title: Welcome to the Second Edition of
The Justia Insider!
message: We are pleased to release the second issue of the Justia Insider, our monthly employee newsletter. We want to make Justia the best place for you to work and grow professionally. Your participation is truly important, so our editorial team looks forward to receiving your feedback and invites you to actively participate in the next edition.
